description: This Java class, ConvertController, is a REST controller in a Spring Boot application that provides an endpoint to convert a Wikipedia page into Neo4j graph data. It handles POST requests to /api/convert, validates the URL, parses the Wikipedia page, writes graph data to Neo4j, and returns a summary of the operation.

classes.name: ConvertController
classes.description: REST controller providing an endpoint to convert a Wikipedia page into Neo4j graph data.

methods.name: convert
methods.description: Handles POST requests to convert a Wikipedia page URL into Neo4j graph data. Validates URL, parses page, writes graph, and returns a summary.

methods.name: validateWikipediaUrl
methods.description: Validates that the URL is using https and hosts ending with wikipedia.org; returns null if valid or error message if invalid.
